Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Brevinin-1GHa (XXU; 1S=S, UCSS1a; natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals)
Sequence Information.Source: skin, Guenther's Frog,Sylvirana guentheri,Hylarana guentheri(old), Asia

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is most similar (68%) toGaegurin-RN4.Activity: Active against (G, F)  Gram+ S. aureus or MRSA (MIC 2-4 uM), E. faecalis (MIC 8 uM); Gram- E. coli (MIC 4 uM), K. pneumoniae (MIC 8 uM), P. aeruginosa (MIC 32 uM), C. albicans (MIC 2 uM).Replaced 5/2020 with a more active peptide; formatted 4/2024
Literature Information.Author: Chen Q, Cheng P, Ma C, Xi X, Wang L, Zhou M, Bian H, Chen T. 2018
Literature Information.Title: Evaluating the Bioactivity of a Novel Broad-Spectrum Antimicrobial Peptide Brevinin-1GHa From the Frog Skin Secretion of Hylarana guentheri and Its Analogues
